headline: Does Ecolab’s New Water Use Efficiency Index Partnership With CDP Reshape The Bull Case For ECL?
summary: Ecolab Inc. and CDP recently launched the Water Use Efficiency Index, unveiled at the World Economic Forum in Davos, to help companies benchmark and improve operational water performance, starting with a pilot for the beverage and brew segment. This new index not only supports cost and resilience benefits for water-intensive industries but also underscores Ecolab’s role in shaping practical sustainability standards alongside its recent double-digit earnings gains and dividend increase.
